title: Looking For Support Main For Flex Queue
body:
Grinding during the school holidays with my friend and we are looking for a support player who is at least silver or gold. I main adc, add me if interested
Im silver 3 btw

replies.body: I am a support main. If **_you'd like the opposition team to have an additional bad player in it_**, then add me. I only play Flex Queue ranked.
